segments.text: I watch the water overflow, creating a mini waterfall right next to the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s blissfully polishing that plate, lost in her own thoughts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her ignorance is infuriating; can’t she feel the water pooling at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she’s just standing there, so detached from reality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, however, are an entirely different story.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy, with cookie jar ambition, seems completely unfazed by the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m half amused, half terrified at how high up he’s managed to get.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is practically glowing with eagerness; I can’t help but smile at her enthusiasm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But still, I find myself shaking my head; this isn't going to end well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a chaotic ballet of innocence and negligence, and I feel caught between the two.
segments.speaker: PAR
